StringTable.Label: FederationDroneInterceptor_Class_Dec
StringTable.String: An automated beam shuttle set to defend its carrier

StringTable.Label: FederationGuardianFighter_Class_Dec
StringTable.String: An interceptor craft armed with cannons

StringTable.Label: FederationScout_Dec
StringTable.String: Unarmed but quick, with excellent sensor range. It will lose every fight it gets into, so try not to get it into any.

StringTable.Label: ProtoTypeFederationScout_Dec
StringTable.String: With the help of a Promethion augmented Warp Drive, this shuttle is faster than anything we have been able to build in the past.

StringTable.Label: FederationStartingScout_Dec
StringTable.String: Unarmed but quick, with excellent sensor range. It will lose every fight it gets into, so try not to get it into any.

StringTable.Label: FederationStartingSurvey_Dec
StringTable.String: A Constitution class exploration vessel on a 5-year mission. Suited for mapping the stars and conducting diplomatic missions involving green-skinned women.

StringTable.Label: ProtoTypeFederationSurvey_Dec
StringTable.String: A vulcan design, the D'Kyr class assists the Federation fleet in surveying anomalies.

StringTable.Label: FederationExplorer_Dec
StringTable.String: The Oberth class exploration vessel is not typically armed, but carries an extensive sensor suite.

StringTable.Label: FederationSniper_Dec
StringTable.String: Short range and kitted out for beam combat, the Peregrine harks back to the old days of atmospheric combat.

StringTable.Label: FederationBomber_Dec
StringTable.String: A Federation shuttle refitted to carry missiles rather than its standard life-support and sensors.

StringTable.Label: FederationGuardian_Dec
StringTable.String: This Perigrine fighter has been fitted with old-fashioned Kinetic weaponry

StringTable.Label: ProtoTypeFederationGuardian_Dec
StringTable.String: Making use of the exotic yet relatively abundant Durantium, this advanced Peregrine packs a punch.

StringTable.Label: FederationCutter_Dec
StringTable.String: The Centaur class is a mid range ship set up for beam weapons and shields.

StringTable.Label: FederationCutterL_Dec
StringTable.String: Slower version of the Centaur, with longer range but weaker beam weapons. It's still earned its name.

StringTable.Label: FederationDefender_Dec
StringTable.String: The Vulcan-designed D'Kyr class is fitted with missiles for long-range bombardment.

StringTable.Label: FederationDefenderL_Dec
StringTable.String: Slower version of the D'Kyr, suited for long-range engagements. Nothing like exploding things from a distance.

StringTable.Label: FederationGunboat_Dec
StringTable.String: The Centaur-C variant is designed to use Kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: FederationGunboatL_Dec
StringTable.String: Slower version of the Centaur-C, which trades weapon power for range. Keep your distance and you'll be fine.

StringTable.Label: FederationCorvette_Dec
StringTable.String: The Constitution refit features enhanced power generation to support its deadly array of beams, along with a strengthened engineering hull and redesigned deflector array for increased endurance.

StringTable.Label: FederationCorvetteL_Dec
StringTable.String: Slower version of the Constitution refit, with technology to penetrate enemy shields. Very nasty.

StringTable.Label: FederationCorvetteP_Dec
StringTable.String: Shorter range Constitution refit, with longer range beam weapons. Meant for area defence.

StringTable.Label: FederationRanger_Dec
StringTable.String: The Miranda class patrol craft is a resilient ship, armed with torpedo tubes in its upper missile pod.

StringTable.Label: FederationRangerL_Dec
StringTable.String: Slower version of the Miranda, with decoy systems which can confuse enemy point defenses.

StringTable.Label: FederationRangerP_Dec
StringTable.String: Shorter range Miranda, with missiles that travel further. Perfect for harassing the enemy,

StringTable.Label: FederationIntrepid_Dec
StringTable.String: The Intrepid class starship was designed for long-term exploration missions, and is equiped with advanced command-and-control systems and strong defences to house them, with both offence and defence projection abilities.

StringTable.Label: FederationDefiant_Dec
StringTable.String: The Defiant class experimental escort ship is one of the few Federation vessels to be designed primarily for war. It is exceptionally powerful for its size, making use of pulse phasers rather than traditional beams. Its powerful warp engines allow it to intercept most invaders which larger vessels might not catch.

StringTable.Label: FederationCerberus_Dec
StringTable.String: Modeled after the experimental Promethius class starship, the Cerberus shares its cousin's advanced battle-analysis technology, though lacks the characteristic Multi-Vector-Assault mode. Instead, it coordinates the battle capability of other warships such as the Defiant class.

StringTable.Label: FederationCruiser_Dec
StringTable.String: The Galaxy class starship is a large cruiser that can rely on its powerful beam arrays to keep the peace.

StringTable.Label: FederationCruiserL_Dec
StringTable.String: Slower version of the Galaxy, trading weapon power for the capability of knocking out enemy shields entirely.

StringTable.Label: FederationCruiserP_Dec
StringTable.String: Shorter range version of the Galaxy capable of partially penetrating enemy shields. Incredibly deadly.

StringTable.Label: FederationCruiserD_Dec
StringTable.String: Galaxy designed for long range combat. Keep it in the back and watch it rack up the kills.

StringTable.Label: FederationSovereign_Dec
StringTable.String: The pride of the Federation, the Sovereign class is a true Flagship. Able to coordinate the fire of its escorting fleet, a Sovereign will be cutting through enemy shields right and left with its own advanced beam weaponry.

StringTable.Label: FederationBattleship_Dec
StringTable.String: The Akira Class is a front-line battle-cruiser armed with modern Kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: FederationBattleshipL_Dec
StringTable.String: Slower Akira designed to defeat enemy armor systems, at the cost of reduced overall damage.

StringTable.Label: FederationBattleshipP_Dec
StringTable.String: Shorter range Akira, equiped with armor-penetrating rounds.

StringTable.Label: FederationBattleshipD_Dec
StringTable.String: An Akira made for long-range combat. Space-based artillery, capable of raining hell from great distances.

StringTable.Label: FederationCarrier_Dec
StringTable.String: This Galaxy class ship carries numerous battle-ready shuttles and fighters.

StringTable.Label: FederationAvatar_Dec
StringTable.String: The enormous Odyssey class is the pinnacle of Starfleet engineering; it is extremely well-armed.

StringTable.Label: OdysseyPrototype_Dec
StringTable.String: Equipped with the latest in Starfleet technology, this Prototype variant of the Odyssey leverages every resource the Federation has available to enhance the effectiveness of the fleet while weakening opposing forces.

StringTable.Label: FederationAvatarP_Dec
StringTable.String: The enormous Odyssey class is the pinnacle of Starfleet engineering; it is extremely well-armed.

StringTable.Label: FederationAvatarD_Dec
StringTable.String: The enormous Odyssey class is the pinnacle of Starfleet engineering; it is extremely well-armed.

StringTable.Label: FederationOdysseyTorpedo_Dec
StringTable.String: The enormous Odyssey class is the pinnacle of Starfleet engineering; the T variant carries missiles as its primary armament.

StringTable.Label: FederationFortressL_Dec
StringTable.String: The enormous Odyssey class is the pinnacle of Starfleet engineering; the T variant carries missiles as its primary armament.

StringTable.Label: FederationFortressP_Dec
StringTable.String: The enormous Odyssey class is the pinnacle of Starfleet engineering; the T variant carries missiles as its primary armament.

StringTable.Label: FederationFortressD_Dec
StringTable.String: The enormous Odyssey class is the pinnacle of Starfleet engineering; the T variant carries missiles as its primary armament.

StringTable.Label: FederationAssaultCarrier_Dec
StringTable.String: The enormous Odyssey class is the pinnacle of Starfleet engineering; the C variant carries great numbers of smaller ships in to battle

StringTable.Label: FederationColony_Dec
StringTable.String: Large but fragile, the Horizon class is equipped to colonize distant planets.

StringTable.Label: FederationConstructor_Dec
StringTable.String: The Rigel class deep-space construction vessel builds and maintains Federation starbases.

StringTable.Label: FederationFreighter_Dec
StringTable.String: The Antares class freighter transports trade-goods to far-off worlds.

StringTable.Label: FederationTransport_Dec
StringTable.String: Large but fragile ship, packed with troops and vehicles, built to invade unfriendly planets.

StringTable.Label: FederationDroneCarrier_Dec
StringTable.String: Carries fast and deadly Drone Interceptors, that seek out and destroy enemy support craft.

StringTable.Label: FederationBeamSupport_Dec
StringTable.String: The Galaxy-S supports an entire fleet's Beam Weapons and Shield Systems to let the Federation triumph against the odds.

StringTable.Label: FederationStartingColony_Dec
StringTable.String: Our first colony ship - ready to spread the Federation to distant worlds. Or maybe Mars.

StringTable.Label: AwardFederationScout_Dec
StringTable.String: Unarmed but quick, with excellent sensor range. It will lose every fight it gets into, so try not to get it into any.

StringTable.Label: AwardFederationCutter_Dec
StringTable.String: Mid range ship set up for beam weapons and shields. It's earned its name.

StringTable.Label: AwardFederationDefender_Dec
StringTable.String: Mid range missile boat, set up with point defences. Packs a punch.

StringTable.Label: AwardFederationGunboat_Dec
StringTable.String: Mid range shootist, arrayed with kinetic weapons and armor. A mean, mean ship.

StringTable.Label: AwardFederationSurvey_Dec
StringTable.String: long range vessel, suited for mapping the stars and running away from things.

StringTable.Label: AwardFederationFrigate_Dec
StringTable.String: Medium size kinetic-warfare ship. The larger the slug-thrower, the larger the slugs.

StringTable.Label: AwardFederationOverlord_Dec
StringTable.String: Large combat vessel, versatile in nature. For the indecisive who still wants a nice big stick.

StringTable.Label: AwardFederationColony_Dec
StringTable.String: Large but fragile ship, equipped to colonize distant planets.

StringTable.Label: AwardFederationConstructor_Dec
StringTable.String: Large but fragile ship capable of building starbases.

StringTable.Label: AwardFederationFreighter_Dec
StringTable.String: Large but fragile ship, Used to establish trade routes with distant worlds.

StringTable.Label: AwardFederationTransport_Dec
StringTable.String: Large but fragile ship, packed with troops and vehicles, built to invade unfriendly planets.
